root.name: Ball
root.description: GameplayBall is a juggling game that has 2 modes:Mode A: In the regular mode the player is given2 balls to juggle around and for every ball the player manages to juggle 1 points is rewarded.Mode B: In the second mode the player is given 3 balls to juggle however unlike in Mode A every juggled ball is not worth 1 but 10 points. DSi Virtual Console PricingJapan: 200 Points
